name: BHA6
description:
Synopsis:

After Reimu and Marisa destroyed The Pickled Cow and left the Pickle Dimension, the green rift they left from persisted.  Thinking not much of it Reimu and Marisa ignored it.

Little did they know that they were not the only living things left in the Pickle Dimension.

A few days later, the nefarious Dr Pickle arrived with his 4 killer robots, ready to terrorise Gensokyo.

The killer robots are:

Flamemingo

Height: 204

Weight: 93

Attack: 305

Defence: 75

Domain: Air

Power: Solar

Dr Pickle's prize robot, Flamemingo excells in aerial combat, swooping down to attack any potential enemies with blasts of flames.  

Powered by the plentiful solar power, it is an unstoppable warrior at day, but must ration it's energy carefully at night or wherever sun is unavailable.

Blähaj the Great

Height: 521

Weight: 714

Attack: 254

Defence: 164

Domain: Water

Power: Hydroelectric

Dr Pickle's atlantic explorer.  Originally designed for underwater combat but because nothing remotely threatening lived underwater was reassigned to collecting fish for Dr Pickle's meals (he really likes sashimi).

It passively generates power from regenerative breaking, uses electrolysis to generate hydrogen fuel for propulsion, and when out of combat, goes to the bottom of the ocean for geothermal power.

Centausaurus

Height: 236

Weight: 315

Attack: 193

Defence: 180

Domain: Land

Power: Coal

One of Dr Pickle's earliest creations, it was designed for combat in the once dense Pickle Jungles of the Pickle Dimension.  Being largely obsoleted by later robots, it is now tasked for collecting vegetation for Dr Pickle's meals.

It is powered by collecting plantlife, converting it into charcoal, and burning it as fuel.

Mandrill

Height: 197

Weight: 230

Attack: 240

Defence: 191

Domain: Land

Power: Money

Dr Pickle's arguably second strongest robot, it largely replaces Centausaurus in combat, with razor sharp drills and saws, it is able  

Created at the peak of Dr Pickle's empirical rule,

Can Reimu and Marisa destroy Dr Pickle's base and also destroy Dr Pickle?

There is no Dr Pickle because no time lol
